job_tasks.phrase: Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the act of writing and deploying code for production systems, a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Envision, build and analyse new features and tools
job_tasks.justification: Envisioning, building, and analyzing features and tools are all part of the software development lifecycle, from ideation to implementation and evaluation.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
job_tasks.justification: Implementing experiments, often in the form of A/B tests or feature flagging, is a common practice in software development to gather data and iterate on product improvements.

job_tasks.phrase: help us achieve an ambitious vision for our Marketing Orchestration Product Group
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a need to understand and contribute to the strategic vision of a product group, which requires business context.

job_tasks.phrase: each contributing to company growth and revenue
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the direct link between the technical work and the business outcomes of growth and revenue, necessitating business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Get exposure to how HubSpot works as a business
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the need to understand the business operations and context.

job_tasks.phrase: Help HubSpot users meet their goals
job_tasks.justification: Understanding user goals is a key aspect of business understanding, as it informs product development to meet market needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
Envision, build and analyse new features and tools
Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on traditional frontend software engineering tasks and does not mention any specific AI technologies, models, or generative AI concepts. The emphasis is on building user-facing products for marketers, with no indication of AI model development, fine-tuning, or deployment.
